name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior AI Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in **Azure**, **Python**, **MLOps**, **CI/CD**, and **Microservices** architecture. Proficient in building scalable and high-performance applications utilizing **Azure Functions**, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes** to ensure efficient deployment and management. Demonstrated expertise in developing **REST APIs** and leveraging **Azure ML** and **Cognitive Services** for advanced AI capabilities, enabling predictive analytics and real-time data processing.

Skilled in comprehensive monitoring and automation strategies, along with implementing robust CI/CD pipelines using tools like **Terraform**. My background in healthcare and financial sectors equips me with a deep understanding of compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. I have successfully led projects that integrate machine learning workflows, underpinned by experience in serving ML models in production using frameworks such as **Airflow** and **Kubeflow**. A passionate advocate for best development practices, I bring strong collaboration and problem-solving skills to every project.
